name: Alice in Wonderland AR match-3
description:
*Works on ARKit compatible devices only! See the list below*.

Wonderland is in danger and you're the only one who can help! Follow the White Rabbit and begin your magical journey.

Complete match-3 levels to travel the fantastical lands. Each level will bring some magic back to Wonderland and it will come alive right in front of your eyes!

Do you want to meet the inhabitants of Wonderland? Use Augmented Reality to bring them to our world!

Compatible with iPhone SE, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone 7, iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, 12.9-inch iPad Pro, 9.7-inch iPad Pro, 10.5-inch iPad Pro, iPad (2017) only.
